text: 2.19 Plp 2.15-16, 4.1, 2 Te 1.4 Bɨawl chɨn Jisas ownɨgab ñɨn ak, tap tay chɨnop gek wɨdɨn mɨdup adek ne ak jak mɨdɨlɨg mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabun? Tap taydɨl nop yomɨl agɨnɨgabun, Chɨn wog gɨtep gɨpun agɨnɨgabun? Nɨbop nep nop yomnɨgabun. Wog chɨn gɨtep gon nɨbi binɨb ne yenɨgabɨm anɨb ak, nop yomɨl mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabun.
